Input addons

These are a collection of input fields with addons functionality such as ammended buttons, dropdowns, contextual menus. In some escenario is good to define specific actions to the inputs you are filling in.

Input addons variations and alternative uses

For input addons we have define a list of alternatives for its uses that would allow us to cover most use cases without compromising consistency.

Left and right setup

Example

  • Search
  • Search
<div class="input-addon"> <a class="btn btn__secondary" href="#">Search</a> <input class="f__textfield" type="text" /> </div> <div class="input-addon"> <input class="f__textfield" type="text" /> <a class="btn btn__secondary" href="#">Search</a> </div>
